Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, I need to look for activities that recur within individual cases. Scanning the log, I see three activities that repeat: Verify Documents, Call Customer, and Adjust Account (though Adjust Account only appears once per case, it's used in different contexts across cases). For each case, I should check where these duplicates occur and what their context is.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Focusing on activities that recur within the same case: Verify Documents recurs in C001 and C003. Call Customer recurs only in C002 (twice in that case).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So the context differs based on whether it's the first verification or a re-verification after some action (like document resubmission or account adjustment).

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Verify Documents: When it's the first verification: Initial Document Verification. When it's the second: Document Re-verification. For Call Customer in C002: First call: Clarify Request via Call (since it's to clarify discrepancy). Second call: Confirm Resolution via Call (to confirm adjustments).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Looking at the Additional Context column for clues: For C001 Verify Documents first time: Agent checks identity documents.  Initial verification Second time: Agent re-checks documents now that ID scan is provided.  Explicitly says re-checks, so Re-verify Documents For C003 Verify Documents first: Physical verification of ID.  Could be Initial Document Verification Second: Re-verify docs after account adjustment.  Re-verify Documents But to keep consistency across cases, maybe use Initial Document Verification and Document Re-verification as the new names.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The prompt says: rename the activities so that their names clearly reflect their contextual differences. So yes, all instances of the activity should be renamed based on context, not just the recurring ones in a case. Therefore, for the revised log, every Verify Documents and Call Customer will be replaced with context-specific names.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now, compiling the new names: For Verify Documents: When it's the first verification in a case: Initial Document Verification. When it's a subsequent verification: Document Re-verification. For Call Customer  context-specific: C001: Request Missing Documents via Call. C002 first: Clarify Account Discrepancy via Call. C002 second: Confirm Account Adjustment via Call. C003: Request Customer Return via Call. For Submit Additional, Submit Additional Documents clarifies what is being submitted.
